TableSpec.Name: MIMED Relationship
TableSpec.Description: This table stores the set id for MIMED Data relationships
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

ForeignKeyField.Description: Stores the ID of the relationship constituent
ForeignKeyField.Name: UMHSID

ForeignKeyField.Description: Stores the ID of the reciprocal relationship constituent
ForeignKeyField.Name: RECIPROCALUMHSID

GuidField.Description: Stores the relationship type for the relationship record
GuidField.Name: RELATIONSHIPTYPECODEID

GuidField.Description: Stores the relationship type for the reciprocal relationship record
GuidField.Name: RECIPROCALTYPECODEID

DateField.Description: Date that the relationship was established or became effective
DateField.Name: STARTDATE

DateField.Description: Date that the relationship was dissolved or ceased to be effective
DateField.Name: ENDDATE

BooleanField.Description: Designates the relationship as a spouse record
BooleanField.Name: ISSPOUSE

BooleanField.Description: Designates the relationship as a primary business record
BooleanField.Name: ISPRIMARYBUSINESS

BooleanField.Description: Designates the relationship as a contact record
BooleanField.Name: ISCONTACT

CodeTableField.Description: Stores the contact type for records marked as contacts
CodeTableField.Name: CONTACTTYPECODEID

BooleanField.Description: Indicates whether the contact is a primary contact
BooleanField.Name: ISPRIMARYCONTACT

BooleanField.Description: The organization in the relationship will match the individual's gifts.
BooleanField.Name: ISMATCHINGGIFTRELATIONSHIP

ComputedColumnField.Description: Provides a translation field for the relationship record
ComputedColumnField.Name: DESCRIPTION

ForeignKeyField.Description: Stores the category of the job for this relationship
ForeignKeyField.Name: RELATIONSHIPSETID

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this relation is an emergency contact.
BooleanField.Name: ISEMERGENCYCONTACT

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this relation receives report cards for the MIMED record.
BooleanField.Name: RECEIVESREPORTCARD
